Klasse LobbyDataBridge

java.lang.Object
viewmodel.LobbyDataBridge
public class LobbyDataBridge extends Object
Manages the data shared between the lobby UI and the game logic. It maintains player information, game status, error messages, and map selection states for all connected clients.

    • addIdToPlayerNameMap

      public void addIdToPlayerNameMap(int clientID, String playerName)
      Adds a player's ID and name mapping to the internal storage.
      Parameter:
      clientID - The unique identifier of the client.
      playerName - The name of the player.

    • addOrUpdatePlayer

      public void addOrUpdatePlayer(int clientId, String playerName, int figureNumber, boolean isReady)
      Updates or adds a new player to the player list.
      Parameter:
      clientId - The client's unique ID.
      playerName - The name of the player.
      figureNumber - The number representing the player's robot.
      isReady - Indicates if the player is ready.

    • setPlayerReady

    • setErrorMessage

      public void setErrorMessage(String eMessage, int clientID)
      Sets an error message to be displayed to all clients, optionally associating it with a specific player.
      Parameter:
      eMessage - The error message.
      clientID - The ID of the client associated with the error (-1 if general).
